questions.question: Which of the following best describes an Algorithm
questions.choice1: A process or set of rules to be followed in calculations or other problem-solving operations, especially by a computer.
questions.choice2: Program statements that run to execute a task.
questions.choice3: A set of instructions written in a programming language to perform a task.
questions.choice4: Set of instructions decoded from a high-level programming code to perform the task.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a programming language?

Which popular data structure implements the LIFO (Last In First Out) principle ?
What does a compiler do ?
questions.choice1: Translates computer code from machine level to byte code.
questions.choice2: Translates computer code from higher-level programming language to machine code.
questions.choice3: Translates computer code from lower-level programming language to higher-level programming language.
